title: decentralized peertopeer payment network
extract: Havven is a decentralized, peer-to-peer payment platform that allows users to perform transactions in a price-stable cryptocurreny ecosystem. ... It also allows the transacting of fiat currencies, which can easily be exchanged before processing payment.Mar 29, 2018
extract_html: Havven is a decentralized, peer-to-peer payment platform that allows users to perform transactions in a price-stable cryptocurreny ecosystem. ... It also allows the transacting of fiat currencies, which can easily be exchanged before processing payment.Mar 29, 2018
